amendment.description: To strike a provision relating to judicial review.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 30 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 41. Record Vote Number: 27.
Amendment SA 30 proposed by Senator Leahy to Amendment SA 2. (consideration: CR S400, S407; text: CR S400) To strike a provision relating to judicial review.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 30 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 41. Record Vote Number: 27.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 30 proposed by Senator Leahy to Amendment SA 2.
